channel.title: NPC Drops Need help
channel.description:
Hi I'm trying to make a penguin and chaos elemental drop something but it won't work.
I have this in npcdrops.cfg-----
Chaos ele: npcdrop = 3200 1 7449 1 15345 1 15348 1 15350 1
Penguin: npcdrop = 131 0 995 100000000

item.title: NPC Drops Need help
item.dc:creator: @regesterd regesterd
item.description:
@regesterd wrote:

ok i know whats the problem(i think)

Chaos ele:
npcdrop = 3200 1 7449 1 15345 1 15348 1 15350 1

ok so lets say you want your npc to drop a Armardly Godsword.

so what you do is open npcdrops.cgs and go to the npc thats going to drop the AGS.

now instead of using spaced use the tab button on your keyboad and change it to this

Chaos ele:
npcdrop = 3200 1 7449 1 15345 1 15348 1 15350 1 “use tab” “item id” “tab” “amount”

thand save and restart your source-no compiling needed =]

remember to use thos tabs!

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Drops Need help
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

They have to be lined up like this
npcdrop = 49 554 449 64 Fire Runes
And you have to space/tab it right
what you do is
type “npcdrop”
then tab it to the =
then to the npc id u space it
then the next thing where u tab it after the npc id, is the id of the item u want it to drop,
then the next one is how many,
and the last one is the percent itll drop, 100 doesnt always work, so i suggest u put 1000 for percent if u want something to always drop that, then u tab it once more and put the name of the item.
I hope this helped.

Read full topic

item.description:
@blumio wrote:
